General.Name: ESSA Pharma Inc
General.Description: ESSA Pharma Inc., a clinical stage pharmaceutical company, focuses the development of small molecule drugs for the treatment of prostate cancer. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
